cards.description: Deploying robotics and other automation tools
cards.title: Industrial zone

industrial.title: Industrial development for over 50 years.
industrial.text-1: OSTIM Global is the international division of the reputable Turkish industrial zone OSTIM, which has been a flagship of industrial development for over 50 years.
industrial.subtitle: Meet the Industry power
industrial.text-2: Today, the company is actively developing the Turkish-Uzbek Industrial Zone, combining managerial expertise and technical know-how.
